overview:
Two of the top single parenting experts in the country have joined forces to launch www.singlemommyhood.com: the first-ever website to offer a whole new way to think about single parenting.

â€¢ Dr. Leah Klungness is the No. 1, best-selling self-help single parent author of The Complete Single Mother.

â€¢ Rachel Sarah, a.k.a. “Single Mom Seeking,” is the No. 1, top single parent blogger (www.singlemomseeking.com/blog) and the author of Single Mom Seeking.

Singlemommyhood aims to reach the nearly four out of ten mothers who are single moms – as well as the one in 45+ homes headed by single dads.

Singlemommyhood enthusiastically encourages and support single parents. Unlike other parenting sites, this one dishes about topics other sites pointedly ignore like romance, dating, and intimacy.

After all, single parents are not the sexless creatures the media typically portrays.

The site features new concise daily blog posts – after all, single parents are in a constant time crunch – including frank and candid information about relationships, parenting, and sexuality.

Where else are they going to get the inside scoop?
